message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: Iterator<CStick> it = testCStickChart.iterator();
for (CStick localCStick : testCStickChart) {
  System.out.println(localCStick.getEPIC());
  if(it.hasNext()){
    System.out.println("next EPIC is " + it.next().getEPIC());
  }
}
<<<explanation>>>: You're creating a new iterator every time you call testCStickChart.iterator().next().getEPIC(). Instead, you should create an iterator before the loop and use it inside the loop. This way, the iterator will keep its state between iterations.
